setup (function).description: Add a setup() function for a p5 project.
body: /** This function sets up our sketch. */

draw (function).description: Add a draw() function for a p5 project.
body: /** This function redraws the sketch multiple times a second. */

preload (function).description: Add a preload() function for a p5 project.
body: /** This function loads resources that will be used later. */

clicked (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is clicked.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is clicked.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

doubleclick (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is double-clicked.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is double-clicked.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

moved (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is moved.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is moved.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

dragged (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is dragged.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is dragged.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

pressed (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is pressed.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is pressed.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

released (mouse event).description: Add a function that is called when the mouse is released.
body: * This function is called when the mouse is released.
* @param {MouseEvent} event The `MouseEvent` that is passed as an argument.

init (utility).description: Create the initial file in a p5 project.
body: /** This function sets up our sketch. */
/** This function redraws the sketch multiple times a second. */

file (utility).description: Create a new file in a p5 project.

print (utility).description: Print some text to the developer console.

note (utility).description: Add a comment within your code.
